text:
Linda "Lin" Shaye (born October 12, 1943) is an American movie, theater and television actress. She is called a scream queen due to her roles in various horror franchises or movies.
Her best known roles are in "A Nightmare on Elm Street", "Critters", "Insidious", "Dead End", "2001 Maniacs" and its sequel ', "Alone in the Dark", ', "Tales of Halloween", "Abattoir", "Ouija" and its prequel '.
